text: The Datuk Wira Poh Ah Tiam Machap Recreational Park (; ) is a park in Machap Baru, Alor Gajah District, Melaka, Malaysia. The park commemorates the late politician Poh Ah Tiam. ==History== The park was opened in 2007 and officiated by Prime Minister Najib Razak. ==Architecture== The park was constructed with a cost of MYR1.2 million. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Melaka ==References== Category:2007 establishments in Malaysia Category:Geography of Malacca Category:Parks in Malaysia
title: Datuk Wira Poh Ah Tiam Machap Recreational Park
